TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许开发人员仅重写 区域中 控件的选定部分的呈现。

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of controls in an zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Chrome 指的是外围用户界面 (UI) 元素，这些元素框架包含在区域中的每个 Web 部件控件或服务器控件。Chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each Web Parts control or server control contained in a zone. 控件的 chrome 包含其边框、标题栏和标题栏中显示的图标、标题文本和谓词菜单。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观是在区域级别设置的，并应用于区域中的所有控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the controls in the zone. Web 部件控件集使用 类呈现控件的 chrome 。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外，此类还为开发人员提供了一种自定义区域中任何控件的呈现方式的方法 。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any controls in an zone. 例如，可以重写 方法以自定义区域中定义的某些特定样式属性 。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes defined in the zone. 类包含若干重要的方法，当您想要重写控件的呈现时，这些方法非常有用 。The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 一个是 构造函数，当你在 自定义类中重写方法 以创建自定义对象的实例时，将使用该构造函数 。One is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一种有用的方法是 方法，该方法可用于控制区域中控件的内容区域 (而不是镶边元素（如页眉、页脚和标题栏) ）的呈现。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 最后，如果要对呈现控件的所有方面进行完全的编程控制 ，可以重写 方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类来重写 区域中控件的默认呈现 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in an zone. 此代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载示例中的所有控件的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 一个包含自定义类和区域的源代码的类 。A class that contains the source code for a custom class and zone. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 该用户控件的源代码来自其他主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 要使此代码示例正常运行，你需要从 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) 主题中获取该用户控件的 .ascx 文件，并将该文件放在此代码示例中 .aspx 页面所在的同一文件夹中。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 该示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 请注意，在 `Register` 文件顶部附近有一个指令，用于注册编译的组件和一个标记前缀。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 另请注意，页面使用元素引用自定义编辑器区域 `` 。Also note that the page references the custom editor zone using the element ``. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分包含自定义编辑器部件 chrome 和 editor part 区域的实现。The third part of the example contains the implementation of the custom editor part chrome and editor part zone. `MyEditorZone` 扩展 和重写 以返回自定义编辑器部件 chrome。`MyEditorZone` extends and overrides to return the custom editor part chrome. `MyEditorPartChrome` 更改方法中编辑器部件控件的背景色 。`MyEditorPartChrome` changes the background color of the editor part control in the method. 在方法中更改区域的背景色 ，并将文本添加到方法中的编辑器部件 。The background color of the zone is changed in the method, and text is added to the editor part in the method. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#2)]

para.span: 如果从 类继承，则必须创建自定义 区域以返回自定义 类。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you must create a customized zone to return your customized class.

para.span: 此类概述的 "示例" 部分演示如何创建自定义 区域以返回自定义 类

span.span: The Example section of this class overview demonstrates how to create a customized zone to return a customized class

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化 类的一个新实例。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要由 区域在其方法中使用 ，以创建对象的实例 ，该对象处理 chrome 呈现以及 区域中控件的任何自定义呈现。It is used primarily by an zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象 用 来呈现控件的对象 。The method creates a object that is used by the object to render an control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以更改编辑器部件控件的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor part control. 有关运行示例所需的完整代码（包括承载这些控件的网页），请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. summary.span: 执行在呈现 控件之前必须完成的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，您可以执行在事件中必须完成的任务， 而不能在呈现控件时执行这些任务，如将样式表应用于控件。The method allows you to perform tasks that must be done during the event and cannot be done when the control is rendered, such as applying a style sheet to a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以更改编辑器区域的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor zone. 有关运行示例所需的完整代码（包括承载这些控件的网页），请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#4)]

span.span: The that receives the content.
The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现完整的 控件及其所有部分。

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现完整的 控件，其中包含标题、内容和脚注。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 重写此方法使开发人员能够完全以编程方式控制呈现的所有方面 `editorPart` ; 出于这一原因，重写此方法非常复杂。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `editorPart`; for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex.

span.span: The control that refers to is .

The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现 控件的主内容区域，不包括页眉和页脚。

span.span: Renders the main content area of an control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你可以重写的正文区呈现 `editorPart` ，同时将页眉和页脚呈现为默认呈现。The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `editorPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以将文本添加到编辑器部件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to add text to the editor part. 有关运行示例所需的完整代码（包括承载这些控件的网页），请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#5)]

para.span: 您可以选择重写 方法。

span.span: You can optionally override the method.

para.span: 如果是这样，只需执行所需的任何呈现自定义 ，然后调用其 方法即可。

span.span: If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对 区域的引用，该区域包含对象为其 提供呈现的控件。The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering.
